summary: A letter from the Warden of the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York to Judge Richard M. Berman, confirming that the FBI and OIG investigations into Jeffrey Epstein's death will include the July 23, 2019 incident at the MCC. The letter states an internal investigation was completed but details cannot be divulged.

keyFacts: An incident involving Jeffrey Epstein occurred at the MCC on or about July 23, 2019.
An internal investigation regarding the July 23, 2019 incident was completed prior to this letter.
The FBI and Office of the Inspector General (OIG) are conducting investigations that will include the July 23 incident.
The Warden states he cannot divulge any information about the prior internal investigation at this time.
The correspondence is part of the official record in the case United States v. Jeffrey Epstein (19-cr-00490-RMB).
